# Spear
## Overview
A spear is 5 feet in length and can be thrown.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Spear | 2 gp | 1d6 | 1d8 | x3 | 20 ft. | 6 lbs. | P | brace |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 148
